input: With reference to India polity, which one of the following statements is correct?

options.A: Planning commission is accountable to parliament.
options.B: President can make ordinance only when either of the two houses of parliament is not in session.
options.C: The minimum age prescribed for appointment as a judge of the Supreme Court is 40 years.
options.D: NDC is constituted of Union Finance Minister and the Chief Ministers of all the states.
